name: Custom Name

mod-toggled.name: Enabled
mod-toggled.description: Toggle custom name for you, you will still be able to see other usernames from other users

username.name: Change Name
username.description: Changes your name to what you type into the text box.
username.enable-if-description: You can only set this if you have the mod ON!

description: Make yourself have your own name. (Only appears for yourself). Rewriten for bug fixes
